gov.va.med.srcalc.security

Interface VistaDaoFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VistaLinkVistaDaoFactory

    public interface VistaDaoFactory
    Allows clients to construct new VistA DAOs without knowing the implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VistaPatientDao getVistaPatientDao()
      Returns a VistaPersonDao that will execute under the context of the current user.
      VistaPersonDao getVistaPersonDao(java.lang.String division)
      Returns a VistaPersonDao for the specific VistA division.
      VistaSurgeryDao getVistaSurgeryDao()
      Returns a VistaSurgeryDao that will execute under the context of the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • getVistaPersonDao

        VistaPersonDao getVistaPersonDao(java.lang.String division)
        Returns a VistaPersonDao for the specific VistA division.
        Parameters:
        division - e.g., "500"
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the VistA communication is somehow misconfigured
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given division is not known

      • getVistaPatientDao

        VistaPatientDao getVistaPatientDao()

        Returns a VistaPersonDao that will execute under the context of the current user.

        Note that, unlike getVistaPersonDao(String), the division is implied in the current user context.

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the VistA communication is somehow misconfigured

      • getVistaSurgeryDao

        VistaSurgeryDao getVistaSurgeryDao()

        Returns a VistaSurgeryDao that will execute under the context of the current user.

        Note that, unlike getVistaPersonDao(String), the division is implied in the current user context.

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the VistA communication is somehow misconfigured
